title: Graffiti cake
description: This cake looks really impressive but is so simple to make. Perfect for a birthday or special celebration. You’ll need 20cm/8in cake board for this recipe.
ingredients: 200g/7oz butter, softened, plus extra for greasing
½ a vanilla pod, seeds scraped out or 2 drops vanilla extract
½ a vanilla pod, seeds scraped out or 2 drops vanilla extract
130ml/4½fl oz golden syrup or liquid glucose
